source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: Learn 3D Illusion Art From Scratch - Basic Course
items.headline: Unique and creative art learning with step by step detailed and easy methods
objectives_summary: Understanding World of 3D Illusion Art - Learning to create multiple types of 3d illusions with step by step detailed and easy methods.
Different types of 3d illusions which can be made on paper, wall, floor and body with use of different media of colors .
Learning secret blending, merging and shadow techniques.

items.title: Sketch and Travel: Ultimate Guide to Watercolor Sketching
items.headline: Learn watercolor sketching techniques while painting 6 projects about Thailand and learning its culture
objectives_summary: Watercolor sketching techniques. You will sketch using tonal contrast, inking in grisaille style, temperature contrast, funky approach, complimentary colors contrast and realistic style.
How to sketch fast: focus on important moments/details & simplify subjects.
Minimalistic art supplies set: how to pack your bag for sketching on a go.

items.title: Color Theory and Exercises

visible_instructors.name: Mandar
visible_instructors.job_title: Fine Artist, Sculptor, Illustrator, and Engineer
visible_instructors.title: Mandar Marathe

items.headline: Learn The 3 Characteristics of Color, How To Mix Any Color You Want And Achieve Mastery Over Color Mixing!
objectives_summary: Understand the characterisitcs of color
Mix a perfect target color using a limited palette
Learn the exercises to gain mastery over color mixing

items.title: Cake Decorating Essentials: Nailing Fondant
items.headline: Cover tall cakes in fondant with confidence and get those sharp edges too. Through the Seamless Paneling Method
objectives_summary: Learn my "Seamless Paneling Method" for covering tall cakes in fondant, and how to get those crisp, sharp edges
How to get consistent results when working with fondant
Incredible fundamentals for Sugar Craft

items.title: THREE Abstract painting textured NEON pink GOLD leaf Acrylic
items.headline: Have fun creating THREE modern GOLD leaf Acrylic abstract Paintings
objectives_summary: How to create a large abstract acrylic painting with gold foil from start to finish.
This course is for beginners, and not only, who want to know more about acrylic painting.
In this class you will learn techniques on how to make large abstract acrylic paintings with various acrylic paint and gold leaf.

items.title: Pottery, Clay & Leaves: Make a Beautiful Unique Leaf Platter

visible_instructors.name: Sonya
visible_instructors.job_title: MBTI Coach, Crystal Therapist, Reiki Master, Trainer, Author
visible_instructors.title: Sonya Wilkins

items.headline: Hand-build Unique Leaf Plates & Platters in Clay Using The Impression From Real Leaves & Harness Nature's Healing Beauty
objectives_summary: How to make a beautiful pottery leaf plate or platter using clay and real leaves in simple constructive steps
What clay is and how to work most effectively with it, understanding it's different states and types
How to decide what clay to use, based on the function (use) of the item you are making & the glaze effect you want

items.title: Fundamentals of Drawing
items.headline: Learn The Key Concepts of Drawing.
objectives_summary: Learn The Key Concepts of Drawing.
Framing your composition
Using the picture plane

items.title: Sketching with markers
items.headline: Learn how to create beautiful sketches with markers.
objectives_summary: drawing
sketching
illustration

items.title: Create bold paintings with these simple techniques
items.headline: Learning new techniques with acrylic paint
objectives_summary: Students will create a bold painting, using bright colors and texture.  Students will also learn transfer techniques and practice paint application and brush control.

items.title: Modern and Contemporary Art
items.headline: From modern art History to a personal creative style - and Marketing plan
objectives_summary: Visual arts´ main questions
Art history and art movements
Visual artists´ practical knowledge

items.title: You Can Sketch Faces!
items.headline: Understanding Form, Proportions and Color
objectives_summary: In this class we will look closely at faces, and learn the techniques for quickly and correctly capturing them in quick sketches.

items.title: A Complete Course on Acrylic and Gouache Painting Techniques

visible_instructors.name: LetsTute
visible_instructors.job_title: Experts in Mathematics, Science, Accounting & Art and Craft
visible_instructors.title: LetsTute Make it Easy

items.headline: Learn to Paint Acrylic Paints and Gouache Painting with unique Techniques for Beginners to Advanced level.
objectives_summary: A Complete course for beginner's to intermediate level landscape paintings
Understand more about Color Blending, Color Mixing and and many other techniques useful for Acrylic and Gouache Painting
Various techniques to paint acrylics & gouache painting

items.title: Sketching Street Scenes in Ink and Watercolor

visible_instructors.name: Amy
visible_instructors.job_title: New York Times Bestselling Author & Artist
visible_instructors.title: Amy Stewart

items.headline: Use One-Point Perspective to Create Lively Street Sketches
objectives_summary: How to use one-point perspective and other measuring techniques to draw street scenes
How to add details such as cars, people, trees, and lampposts
How to add shadows and depth with ink and watercolor

items.title: Watercolour for beginners #2
items.headline: The basics you need for success.
objectives_summary: You will learn how easy watercolour painting is.
You will learn how to finish details in watercolour.
You will learn how much fun watercolour painting is.

items.title: Easy Drawing, Painting & Illustration For Absolute Beginners
items.headline: Absolute Beginner Art Course Innovative approaches to making and thinking about art.
objectives_summary: critical understanding of art.
explore a range of media
experiment in a wide range of materials

items.title: Complete Drawing course |For every one, draw Names Magically
items.headline: drawing course - draw any name and make it appears out of the paper as a 3D trick in a short time,(A  Z), Drawing tips.
objectives_summary: How to make any name appears out of the paper as a magical 3D trick.
The true way to draw any letter and the right ratios to use any paper size.
How to draw using the graphite pencils and pens, with a different shading techniques.
